A unique global destination driven by cutting-edge technology in Neom.
Ascend to a vertical village, a portal connecting the digital and the physical.
The seasonal climate provides a multitude of high altitude adventures...
...with the region's first outdoor ski experience.
Enjoy the buzz of world-class entertainment,...
...the crisp mountain air and the world's most advanced health and well-being center...
And as night falls, you can witness the stars as you've never seen them before.
